subject: Psychology
title: Emotional Intelligence
description: A micro-lesson that makes Emotional Intelligence usable.

hook.text: The smartest person in the room keeps alienating everyone. High IQ doesn't guarantee high emotional skill.

buildup.text: Emotional intelligence, popularized by Daniel Goleman, includes perceiving, using, understanding, and managing emotions.

discovery.text: EI predicts job performance, relationship quality, and well-being ‚Äî sometimes better than IQ.

twist.text: Critics say EI is poorly defined and hard to measure. Some argue it's just personality by another name.

climax.text: Regardless of the debate, the core insight stands: understanding emotions is a skill, and skills can be trained.

punchline.text: Emotional skill matters as much as intellectual skill.

quiz.question: What does emotional intelligence include?
options: Perceiving, using, understanding, and managing emotions
